SELECT FileInfo, FileID FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_stamp WHERE EntCode = #{entCode} AND UseYn = 'Y' AND DelYn = 'N' ORDER BY RegDate DESC LIMIT 1

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.vm_vacationinfo (VacYear, UR_Code, UR_Name, VacFlag, Sdate, Edate, VacDay, Reason, APPDATE, ENDDATE, WorkItemID, ProcessID, GUBUN, DEPUTY_NAME, DEPUTY_CODE, VacOffFlag ) VALUES (#{vacYear}, #{urCode}, #{urName}, #{vacFlag}, #{sDate}, #{eDate}, #{vacDay}, #{reason}, #{appDate}, #{endDate}, #{workItemID}, #{processID}, #{gubun}, #{deputyName}, #{deputyCode}, #{vacOffFlag} )
mapper.select: SELECT Code AS CODE, CodeName AS CODE_VALUE FROM covi_smart4j.sys_base_code WHERE CodeGroup = #{CodeGroup} AND IsUse = 'Y' ORDER BY SortKey ASC

ORDER BY CodeName ASC
